Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;iodine^reset; to ^green;Bella^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Good work! Several basic ingredients such as iodine are essential. So stay stocked! You'll need iodine specifically to make graphene and high quality fertilizers!

You'll need to find some ^green;caliche stone^reset; if you want to get ^orange;iodine^reset;. Throw ^orange;batches of caliche stone^reset; into your ^green;extraction lab^reset; and bring me some! You'll find them on ^orange;desert biomes^reset;.
